engine.android.util.image

类 ImageSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.android.util.image.ImageSize

  • public class ImageSize
extends Object
    A convenient utility to manager image's size.
    从以下版本开始:
    5/28/2016
    作者:
    Daimon
